body.name: Nature's Answer Periobrite Cool Mint All-Natural Mouthwash | Promotes Healthy Teeth & Gums | Fights Bad Breath | Flouride-Free, Alcohol-Free & Gluten-Free | No Articial Preservatives 16oz (2 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 37 mins
features: Only PerioBrite Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with CoQ10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon, and Clove to support tissue and gum health.

Launched in 1972 from Frank Sr. and Josephine D’Amelio’s garage, Nature’s Answer was founded to create high-quality herbal extracts and nutritional products that support, promote, and enhance healthy lifestyles, filling a void in the natural products marketplace at the time

As one of America’s largest and oldest manufacturers of nutritional supplements, Nature’s Answer is an FDA registered, pharmaceutically licensed herbal manufacturing and quality control facilities, and has one of the most impressive herbariums in the U.S.

Nature’s Answer holds its liquid herbal extracts and nutritional products to the highest purity standards with uncompromising manufacturing practices perfected over its nearly 50-year history, upheld through three generations of the D’Amelio family and still going strong today.
body.description: Keep out of the reach of children under 6 years of age. If you accidentally swallow more than used for brushing, seek professional assistance or contact Poison Control Center immediately.

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Natural Teeth Whitening, Fresh Breath, Stain Removal

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great Tasting Natural Mouthwash Available in 3 Flavors Gluten-Free. Fluoride-Free. Soy Free/Vegetarian. No Sodium-Lauryl-Sulfate. No Artificial Sweeteners. No Artificial Preservatives. Patented Phytoplenolin PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains Phytoplenolin, a patented herbal extract that has been shown in independent laboratory studies to promote cell vitality. Soothing wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, are combined with CoQ10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to promote tissue and gum wellness. Smile Naturally PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash is a great tasting mouthwash that keeps breath fresh and clean. As a part of your oral health program, PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash energizes the whole mouth with a cool, sparkling minty-fresh sensation.

About Nature's Answer Family Owned and Operated for Over 4 Decades From humble beginnings back in 1972 to our modern state-of-the-art facility, Nature’s Answer has evolved into one of today’s largest family-owned and operated manufacturers of high-quality nutritional products. The Genius of Mother Nature in Every Bottle Our state of the art laboratory equipment has identified each and every plant’s distinctive botanical fingerprint, which we then use as our baseline to analyze the quality and purity of every incoming botanical used to manufacture our products. Exclusive Bio-Chelation Extraction Process The Bio-Chelation process is a proprietary cold extraction technique developed by Mr. Frank D’Amelio Sr., founder and owner of Nature’s Answer. Bio-Chelation includes the use of cold extraction, where the raw plant parts are extracted without being exposed to heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tastes great, not too sweet
reviews.reviewText: I really like the Cinamint flavor. It has the invigorating taste of cinnamon without being candy-like sweet. I've been using this mouthwash for over a year. I use it alone as well as part of my dental regimen. It's especially helpful if I don't feel like brushing my teeth but want to freshen my mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Though when I received my package one of the bottles top was crushed in I manage to fix it. The flavor is great I thought it would taste like peroxide but it has a great taste n leaves ur mouth refresh as well as your gums

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife has been using this stuff for years. She likes it and uses it every night.Personally, I haven't tried it and don't use it.When it became difficult to find this at any stores near me, I found it on Amazon.I may have paid a small premium to get it, but my wife is happy - her mouthwash is still available.It's nice to be able to keep her happy -- at least about having her nightly mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product BAD packaging!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for years and love it! However, when I ordered my stock this time, not only was the product, not as photographed they changed the packaging to make it more difficult to open. This is not appreciated! Because of my arthritis, I cannot even open this without help,, so I’m having to move my mouthwash into another container which defeats the purpose. It should be in a dark bottle not a light bottle!5 stars for the contents ZERO stars for their packaging!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More effective and natural than store products
reviews.reviewText: My gum was not in great shape 3 years back. I improved gum-health with Lusterine to some reasonable extent. I’m using it instead for last 1.5 years and tell you what, gums are much better and the product is more natural. I do not write reviews but this product is amazing-please try!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great! Never change!!
reviews.reviewText: In a word: Yum! I think this mouthwash is very fresh! I love the taste. I dilute it with water in a shot glass and use as a mouthwash. It smells so good and my mouth is enjoying this AMAZING product. Now I do dilute it with another natural mouthwash product and shake them up and then dilute with water and do a shot mouthwash. Works perfect, right amount of “zing” to it and the flavor is PERFECT – NEVER change the ingredients!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More natural than Listerine
reviews.reviewText: Found this product as a great replacement to Listerine. This product has no alcohol, dyes or other chemicals. It has the same active ingredients as Listerine, it has the essential oils of thymol and eucalyptus. Also has other natural leaf oils that make this product strong and effective for a mouth rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heals the gums, tooth aches, and cleans well!
reviews.reviewText: Tastes better than any organic brand I have tried. And I have tried many! The ingredients are far better than of its competitors. Worth the price.
This mouthwash contains among other extras COq10 which helps strengthen gums. Helps prevent periodontal disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouth wash has a really nice taste , keeps teeth and gums fresh and clean and is great value 😊
Not very gentle on my mouth. It burns like crazy!

Schmeckt sehr angenehm, durch Zimt und andere Gewürze wird die nötige Schärfe erreicht. Erfrischt langanhaltend. eigentlicher Grund war, daß man es auch in die Munddusche einfüllen kann. Auch dies funktioniert problemlos

Ich habe schon seit Jahren Natures Answer Mouthwash benutzt.Aber erstens hat mir der Verkäufer Coolmint nicht Cinnamint!! geschickt.Als ich den Verkäufer kontaktierte wurde mir gesagt das sie garkein Cinnamint auf Lager haben. Stattdessen wurden mir 2 Flaschen Coolmint geschickt ohne überhaupt nachzufragen ob ich Coolmint anstelle von Cinnamint möchte.Ich habe Natures Answer Mouthwash schon seit vielen Jahren benutzt, aber diese Coolmint Flaschen waren super eklig und haben fast den Mund verätzt.Seitdem habe ich den Hersteller in Amerika kontaktiert und die haben mir netterweise Ersatzflaschen geschickt und die sind wieder die gewohnte Qualität und Geschmack von Natures Answers Mundwasser.Ich habe keine Ahnung was die aus Schottland schicken, aber als Mundwasser eignet sich das nicht und es ist ein sehr schlechtes Beispiel für ein ansonsten wundervolles Produkt..
